text:
The appreciation is the inverse of the depreciation, 7
--1 = 0.0141.
(1 – 0.0139)
LOS 20.d
Given two exchange rate quotes for three different currencies, we can calculate a
currency cross rate. If the MXN/USD quote is 12.1 and the USD/EUR quote is 1.42,
we can calculate the cross rate of MXN/EUR as 12.1 x 1.42 = 17.18.
